description: 3D artists typically use Blockbench to create and edit 3D models featured in video games, including Minecraft . The BBMODEL file is the primary file type associated with Blockbench.
When you save a 3D model project by selecting File â†’ Save Project As , you preserve your work in the BBMODEL file. After saving the project, you can close and reopen it for further editing.
